Open Source Rails Apps / Other external resources

  • blackCandy (‚≠ê3.6k) - A music streaming app (using Rails 7.0).
  • campo (‚≠ê440) - A forum app (using Rails 4.1).
  • crowdAI (‚≠ê149) - An app for data science challenges (using Rails 5.2). - üåç
  • dcaf_case_management (‚≠ê91) - A case management app (using Rails 7.0).
  • eol (‚≠ê60) - An encyclopedia app - using Rails 3.2 - üåç
  • graff_mags (‚≠ê19) - A graffiti magazine sharing app (using Rails 4.1).
  • hashrobot (‚≠ê49) - A social media management app (using Rails 4.2).
  • hours (‚≠ê1k) - A time tracking app (using Rails 4.2).
  • loomio (‚≠ê2.5k) - A collaborative decision-making app (using Rails 6.1). - üåç
  • mastodon (‚≠ê49k) - A microblogging app (using Rails 6.1). - üåç
  • openstreetmap-website (‚≠ê2.4k) - A map viewing app (using Rails 7.0). - üåç
  • postal (‚≠ê16k) - A mail delivery platform (using Rails 5.2).
  • rletters - A frontend for database of journal articles for researchers (using Rails 6.0).
  • scholarsphere (‚≠ê12) - A digital assets management app - using Rails 6.1
  • websiteOne (‚≠ê144) - A project tracking app (using Rails 6.1).

Gems / Other external resources

  • rails_admin (‚≠ê7.9k) - A gem to create & manage admin panel for Rails app. üî¥
  • rails_semantic_logger (‚≠ê362) - A gem to provide alternative logging approach for Rails app. üî¥
  • ranked-model (‚≠ê1.1k) - A gem to handle sorting for rows. üî¥
  • rubocop-rails (‚≠ê843) - A code style checking tool. üî¥
  • shakapacker (‚≠ê445) - A gem to use webpack to manage app-like JavaScript modules in Rails. üî¥
  • view_component (‚≠ê3.4k) - A gem to introduce view components. üî¥

Platforms / Other external resources

Gems / Other external resources

  • actioncable (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to integrate websocket with a Rails app üî¥ - Action Cable Overview
  • actionmailbox (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to handle incoming emails within a Rails app üî¥ - Action Mailbox Basics
  • actionmailer (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to compose, deliver & test emails within a Rails app üî¥ - Action Mailer Basics
  • actionpack (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to manage requests & responses within a Rails app üî¥
  • actiontext (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to integrate rich text editor into a Rails app üî¥ - Action Text Overview
  • actionview (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to handle view templates within a Rails app üî¥ - Action View Overview
  • activejob (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to handle background jobs within a Rails app üî¥ - Active Job Basics
  • activemodel (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to define a set of interfaces to use in model classes within a Rails app üî¥ - Active Model Basics
  • activerecord (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to connect model classes with relational databases within a Rails app üî¥ - Active Record Basics
  • activestorage (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to handle file uploads to cloud storage providers within a Rails app üî¥ - Active Storage Overview
  • activesupport (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to provide some extensions to support a Rails app üî¥ - Active Support Core Extensions
  • railties (‚≠ê57k) - A gem to handle gems & engines used in a Rails app to work together üî¥

entry.title: Awesome Rails Updates on Feb 25, 2021
entry.content:
Gems / Other external resources

  • rails (‚≠ê57k) - A full-stack web development framework üî¥
  • ace-rails-ap (‚≠ê134) - A gem to integrate ajax.org cloud9 editor into Rails asset pipeline. üî¥
  • action_policy (‚≠ê1.5k) - A tool to handle authorization. üî¥
  • active_decorator (‚≠ê1.1k) - A gem to keep views & helpers object-oriented. üî¥
  • active_enum (‚≠ê132) - A gem to provide enum classes üî¥
  • activeadmin (‚≠ê9.6k) - A gem to provide admin panel. üî¥
  • activerecord-analyze (‚≠ê224) - A gem to add EXPLAIN ANALYZE to Rails Active Record query objects. üî¥
  • activerecord-import (‚≠ê4.1k) - A gem to handle bulk data insertion using ActiveRecord. üî¥
  • activerecord-pg_enum (‚≠ê166) - A gem to integrate PostgreSQL's enumerated types with the Rails enum feature. üî¥
  • activerecord-postgis-adapter (‚≠ê906) - ActiveRecord connection adapter for PostGIS. üî¥
  • activerecord-postgres_enum (‚≠ê365) - A gem to adds migration and schema.rb support to PostgreSQL enum data types. üî¥
  • activerecord-sqlserver-adapter (‚≠ê981) - ActiveRecord connection adapter for the SQL Server. üî¥
  • activerecord-typedstore (‚≠ê459) - A gem to implement ActiveRecord::Store with type definition. üî¥
  • activity_notification (‚≠ê510) - A gem to integrate user activity notification. üî¥
  • aggregate_root (‚≠ê1.5k) - A gem to handle event sourcing. üî¥
  • ahoy_email (‚≠ê1.2k) - A tool to provide mail analytics. üî¥
  • algoliasearch-rails (‚≠ê415) - A gem to integrate Algolia search. üî¥
  • annotate (‚≠ê4.5k) - A gem to annotate rails classes with schema & routes info. üî¥
  • anycable-rails (‚≠ê512) - A gem to handle websocket server. üî¥
  • apipie-rails (‚≠ê2.5k) - A REST API documentation tool. üî¥
  • auther (‚≠ê23) - A gem to provide simple, form-based authentication. üî¥
  • autoprefixer-rails (‚≠ê1.2k) - A gem to add vendor prefixes to stylesheets. üî¥
  • better_errors (‚≠ê6.9k) - A tool to provide better error page. üî¥
  • brakeman (‚≠ê7.1k) - A gem to scan code against security vulnerabilities. üî¥
  • breadcrumbs_on_rails (‚≠ê955) - A gem to create & manage breadcrumbs-style navigation. üî¥
  • bulma-rails (‚≠ê354) - A wrapper for Bulma, a CSS framework based on flexbox. üî¥
  • cancancan (‚≠ê5.7k) - A gem to handle authorization. üî¥
  • carrierwave (‚≠ê8.8k) - A gem to handle file uploads. üî¥
  • caxlsx_rails (‚≠ê750) - A gem to generate entity-relationship diagram. üî¥
  • counter_culture (‚≠ê2.1k) - A gem to provide counter caches. üî¥
  • devise (‚≠ê24k) - A gem to provide authentication. üî¥
  • doorkeeper (‚≠ê5.4k) - A gem to introduce OAuth2 provider functionality. üî¥
  • draper (‚≠ê5.3k) - A gem to add presentation logic. üî¥
  • factory_bot_rails (‚≠ê3.1k) - A fixture replacement for testing in Rails üî¥
  • filestack-rails (‚≠ê221) - A gem to integrate Filestack. üî¥
  • formtastic (‚≠ê5.2k) - A Rails form builder gem with semantically rich and accessible markup. üî¥
  • friendly_id (‚≠ê6.2k) - A gem to deal with slugs & permalinks. üî¥
  • frozen_record (‚≠ê415) - A gem to provide ActiveRecord-like interface to query static YAML files. üî¥
  • geokit-rails (‚≠ê1.6k) - A gem to integrate Geokit in Rails apps. üî¥
  • good_job (‚≠ê2.8k) - A gem to provide Postgres-based ActiveJob backend. üî¥
  • gretel (‚≠ê18) - A tool to generate breadcrumbs. üî¥

  • image_optim_rails (‚≠ê58) - A gem to handle image optimization. üî¥

entry.title: Awesome Rails Updates on Feb 24, 2021
entry.content:
Starters/Boilerplates / Other external resources

  • default_rails_template (‚≠ê30) - Default template for generating new Rails applications.
  • docker-Rails-Template (‚≠ê134) - A freshly updated version of "rails new", preconfigured to be run with Docker.
  • docker-rails (‚≠ê1.1k)
  • jumpstart(excid3) (‚≠ê1.2k) - Easily jumpstart a new Rails application with a bunch of great features by default.
  • jumpstart(thomasvanholder) (‚≠ê21) - Template for set-up of Rails 6, Tailwind 2.0 and Devise.
  • kickoff_tailwind (‚≠ê581) - A rapid Rails 6 application template for personal use bundled with Tailwind CSS.
  • rails-devise-graphql (‚≠ê286) - A Rails 6 boilerplate to create your next Saas product. Preloaded with graphQL, devise, JWT, CanCanCan, RailsAdmin, Rubocop, Rspec, and more.
  • rails-template(mattbrictson) (‚≠ê1.1k) - Application template for Rails 6 projects; preloaded with best practices for TDD, security, deployment, and developer productivity.
  • rails-template(TristanToye) (‚≠ê34) - MVP Ready Rails - A Template for Your Next Rails App
  • rails-template(ackama) (‚≠ê357) - Application template for Rails 6.1 projects; preloaded with best practices for TDD, security, deployment, and developer productivity.
  • rails-template(astrocket) (‚≠ê79) - Template for Rails 6.0 + Kubernetes + Webpacker + Stimulus + TailwindCSS + Let's Encrypt.
  • rails-template(dao42) (‚≠ê381) - A best & newest & fastest rails 6.x template for senior rails developer.
  • rails-templates(lewagon) (‚≠ê678) - Jump start your Rails development with Le Wagon best practices.
  • rails-templates(nimblehq) (‚≠ê104) - Our optimized Rails templates used in our projects.
  • rails-vue-template (‚≠ê23) - An example of how to use VueJS as a single page application inside Rails using Webpacker.
  • suspenders (‚≠ê4k) - A Rails template with our standard defaults, ready to deploy to Heroku.
  • vuejs-rails-starterkit (‚≠ê214) - Vue.js + Rails Starting Kit GitHub Template to develop Hybrid Mobile Application.
